scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi within a stable-like structure. The Virgin Mary, with a halo, holds the Christ Child on her lap. To her left stands a bearded man, likely Joseph. In the foreground, one of the Magi kneels, offering a golden vessel, while two other Magi stand behind him, one holding a similar vessel. A donkey and an ox are visible in the background, within the dimly lit interior. The architecture is characterized by rough stone walls and arched openings.
